item.description:
Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

Monthly meetings will be held on the third Thursday of every month. Monthly meetings are free to members, $25.00 for visitors.

Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma 781-890-0100

Visitors, when you decide to join that night, we will credit your $25.00 to the cost of the yearly membership.

Steps for Success Trainings and other weekly session locations are to be determined. Costs for these will vary depending on the event. Members will be offered a discount on all educational opportunities.

Upcoming Meetings

September 20, 2007 - Kevin Skarritt of Acorn Creative -

Branding and Web Design

5:30 - 6:30 PM - Networking and Meet the Vendors

6:00 PM - New Member/Visitors Orientation

6:30 PM - Meeting

Kevin Skarritt is on Boston AREIA's Board of Advisors and specializes in Branding and Web Design. Here are just a few of the powerful marketing techniques you will learn...

* You will gain a better understanding of the INSANE POWER and importance of Brand

* You'll be able to select and embrace a psychological archetype as the foundation of your brand strategy - *want to do a little homework? Visit www.AcornCreative.com/questionnaire and answer the 93 question survey to determine your archetype.

* You'll be able to recognize powerful brand strategies and weak strategies without needing extensive training

* You'll briefly review the idea of "integrated marketing" and how you can immediately apply it to your existing marketing strategies and tactics

Visit Kevin's website at www.AcornCreative.com
